Home.WelcomeTextDescription: The execution and all finishing works are set in an extremely high - boutique class. Ixora Residence consists of 13 spacious apartments and 17 garages. The apartments reveal a wonderful panoramic view of city of Sofia and Vitosha mountain. The building has a fully equipped spa center and a gym for the exclusive use of the future residents. The vertical layout according to a special landscape project forms a green belt around the building, which creates a feeling of living in a park environment.
Home.promptToPlan: Choose your luxury new home now.

Footer.desc: Ixora Luxury Residence is a boutique building equipped with a spa center and a gym, situated in the foothills of Vitosha mountain.

Timeline.secondDesc: PC, construction site and first sod

forBuilding.fasadeDesc: Suspended, ventilated, with limestone stone lining and decorative elements of composite panel - etalbond. Rock wool thermal insulation.
forBuilding.lobbyDesc: Executed according to a special interior project with a stone layout of marble and onyx.
forBuilding.joineryDesc: Aluminum joinery of the highest class "WEISS PROFIL" THERMO PRO 85 in anthracite color.
forBuilding.doorsDesc: Armored entrance doors SOLID in oak color - model "iDoor 20-22" Series 50.
forBuilding.heatingDesc: Centrally gas-supplied building. Floors 1 and 2 are fitted with high-end energy-efficient Jaga type radiators. Floors 3 and 4 have underfloor heating with individual thermostats for each room.
forBuilding.garagesDesc: A large number of garages in the basement and additional parking spaces outside the building.
forBuilding.securityDesc: A Fence. Controlled access with chip and license plate recognition. 24/7 live security.
forBuilding.amenitiesDesc: Private gym with "TECHNOGYM" equipment. Spa center with jacuzzi, steam bath and sauna, equipped with heated beds.
forBuilding.proia: 1 minute Proya restaurant and Max supermarket
forBuilding.britanica: 3 minutes BRITANICA Park School and several kindergartens
forBuilding.landscapingDesc: The vertical layout according to a special landscape project forms a green belt around the building, which creates a feeling of living in a park environment.
